description:
Kajika consents to her father`s game, the "Husband Search". Kajika meets a man by the name of Eugene De Volkan. She feels that he has the spirit of a white leopard in his soul, and in order to confirm this, she visits his apartment. Lee-Leng, who has undertaken the duty of overseeing this whole "Husband Search" Game, has a bad feeling about Eugene so he begins to investigate. At the same time he receives the report from the investigationt, there is a woman in Eugene`s apartment, holding a gun.
Source: crunchyroll
